item.description: This will be the last practice I post on this site. It has become apparent that our softball team activites are not wanted here. I planned to post practices for everyone to come out and just have fun. That is not going to work. If anyone wants to keep updated when I will be hosting softball related events for people to come out and play please email or call me. We will be having weekly practices/scrimmage games through out the spring, summer, and fall. Having said that Sat looks to be a lovely day to take the field. My contact info is 203 525 5670 and chrisd4@earthlink.net. Peace from Chris on the other softball team not in any way related to the NHC if there was any confusion.
item.name: Come playball again
